title: Sporting scooters
brief_description: In the fifties, Italian manufacturers captured the unique style of the scooter with Vespa and Lambretta. Their approach to manufacturing scooters proved hugely popular. This programme take a nostalgic look at the fun enjoyed by many scooter enthusiasts of this time. It includes footage from the fifties of rallys, races and other scooter sports throughout Great Britain.
